be.signalsync.msp

Class TeensyReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
      • com.cycling74.msp.MSPObject
        • com.cycling74.msp.MSPPerformer
          • be.signalsync.msp.TeensyReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    be.ugent.ipem.teensydaq.DAQDataHandler, com.cycling74.msp.MSPPerformable

    public class TeensyReader
extends com.cycling74.msp.MSPPerformer
implements be.ugent.ipem.teensydaq.DAQDataHandler
    Max/MSP module for reading signals from a Teensy microcontroller. More information can be found in my thesis.
    Author:
    Ward Van Assche

      • findPortAtIndex

        public static java.lang.String findPortAtIndex(int portIdx)
        Helper method used when a constructor is called with a port index instead of a port name. This is useful when the name of a Teensy port is unknown.
        Parameters:
        portIdx - The index of the port, starting at 0.
        Returns:
        The portname

      • handle

        public void handle(be.ugent.ipem.teensydaq.DAQSample sample)
        This method is called by the TeensyDAQ object when new Teensy samples are available. The samples will be put in buffers.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface be.ugent.ipem.teensydaq.DAQDataHandler
